mapper.sql: id, parent_id, `path`, `name`, descr, icon, `type`, `level`, sort, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: select front.* from sys_front_view_resource front inner join sys_front_view_resource_role front_role on front.id = front_role.view_id inner join sys_role role on role.id = front_role.role_id where front.path=#{frontPath} and role.id = #{roleId}
select front.* from sys_front_view_resource_role front_role inner join sys_front_view_resource front on front_role.view_id = front.id where front_role.role_id = #{roleId} and front.type != 3

select front.* from sys_front_view_resource_role front_role inner join sys_front_view_resource front on front_role.view_id = front.id where front_role.role_id = #{roleId} and front.parent_id= #{parentId} and front.type = 3
select front.* from sys_front_view_resource front order by sort asc

select front.*, back_resource.interface_url as interfaceUrl from sys_front_view_resource_back_inter_resource front_back_resource inner join sys_front_view_resource front on front.id = front_back_resource.front_view_path_id inner join sys_back_end_inter_resource back_resource on front_back_resource.back_end_view_url_id = back_resource.id where front_back_resource.front_view_path_id = #{frontViewId}
